item.title: Muntakhab-i Shāhʹnāmah-i Ḥakīm Abū al-Qāsim Firdawsī, ʻalayhi al-raḥmah va al-maghfirah.
notes: Written in Iran, newer Central Asian binding.

Paper; cream-colored laid paper; black ink; rubrication; pages in four colums within a blue-cream-gold-cream-gold border; few marginal notes and corrections; catchwords on rectos. text preceded by and introduction and table of contents (folios 1b-6b).
Browne, E. G. Literary history of Persia, v. 1, p. 110-123
Nastaʻliq; 25 lines in four columns in written aren 24 x 13.5 cm.
Contains three half page paintings for various battles and combat.
Newer Central Asian binding; olive green leather with embossed medallions, two in dark red; light red leather spine.

Colophon: Tammat al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb Kitāb-i Shāhnāmah guftār-i Firdawsī, navvara Allāh marqadahu tamām shūd, rūz-i panjshanbih 14 māh-i Jamādī al-Avval sanah-i 1027, bi-khaṭṭ-i faqīr-i haqīr Allāh Sayyid ʻAliʼ valad Sayyid Hāshim, ghafara Allāh z̲unūbahu va satara ʻuyūbah.
Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
summary: Selections from the Shāhnāmah of Firdawsī.
medium: 1, 92 leaves (25 lines) bound : paper; 30.7 x 17.5 cm
other_title: منتخب شاهنامه حكيم ابو قاسم فردوسى، عليه الرحمة و المغفرة.

subject: uzbekistan
manuscripts, persian
iran

washington (d.c.)
